title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Ripley's Believe It Or Not! Museum
directions: between Mason St and Taylor St
hours: Mid June - Labor Day Su-Th 9AM-11PM, F-Sa 9AM-midnight; rest of the year Su-Th 10AM-10PM, F-Sa 10AM-midnight
content: Set over 2 floors it has over 10,000 square feet of galleries, exhibits, illusions, and interactive displays.
